subject: Visuals Simsonn
description_text:
Hi there Simsonn,

 

Hope it’s okay to connect like this.

I'm not sure if I got the correct email for the store. ?

 

Are you involved in how the store is set up or presented?

 

Appreciate it!

 

 

Hannah Miller, PR assistant at EnhanceProduct

conversations.body_text: Hi Hannah From Enhanceproduct,     This is our after-sales support email. We have access to all orders placed on our official website, so you can place your order directly. We will arrange prompt shipment and follow up throughout the process. If you encounter any issues, we’ll assist you quickly.    https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals
